original_text: And I will cause them to be removed into all kingdoms of the earth, because of Manasseh the son of Hezekiah king of Judah, for that which he did in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 유다 왕 히스기야의 아들 므낫세가 예루살렘에 행한 것으로 말미암아 내가 그들을 세계 여러 민족 가운데에 흩으리라

sentences.original_text: And I will cause them to be removed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그들을 제거하게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: into all kingdoms of the earth
because of Manasseh the son of Hezekiah
for that which he did in Jerusalem
